sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Over 1,000 Ukrainian towns and villages remain cut off from electricity after 10 days of Russian strikes that have targeted energy facilities across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: An investigation into the Nord Stream 1 gas pipeline leak has revealed at least 50 meters of it has been destroyed or buried in the Baltic sea floor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The EU announces proposals on market intervention to deal with spiralling energy prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Over 100,000 cross-industry workers marched across France for higher wages on Tuesday amid the requisitioning of strikers at fuel refineries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: No running water, no electricity, no basic services.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin's new strategy targeting energy infrastructure has plunged thousands of Ukrainians into darkness and the cold.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The hardest hit are those living in devastated areas, like the recaptured eastern town of Kobyansk, which is still under attack and just 10 kilometres from the front line.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A spokesperson for the state's emergency services says Russian shelling has left 1,162 settlements without power, including some areas in the occupied territories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the Russian Defense Ministry has released footage of its tanks in Ukraine, launching strikes on front-line targets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Military spokesperson Igor Konashenkov says troops have made their first gains in the Kharkiv region since Moscow's troops were pushed back in a sweeping counteroffensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In the southern port city of Mykolaiv, emergency services are searching for people buried in the rubble of an apartment block after it was hit by a missile on Tuesday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Back in the capital, residents are still reeling after explosive-laden suicide drones, allegedly supplied by Iran, struck several apartment blocks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Amid a mammoth cleanup operation, Ukraine's foreign minister has proposed that President Zelensky cut ties with Tehran for what it says is complicity in the crimes of Russian aggression.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But Iran says it has not provided weapons to Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The ongoing investigation into the leaks of two Nord Stream gas pipelines

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: has revealed at least 15 meters of one has been destroyed or buried in the seafloor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: An act of sabotage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: That's what joint Western authorities say about the pipe damage which links Russia and Germany via the Baltic Sea. The Kremlin also believes it was deliberate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: One can only express regret that the entire investigation process is taking place behind closed doors, without permission to participate, without interaction with the Russian side.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We do not have the opportunity to actually carry out work on the spot in order to conduct our own investigation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And most importantly, according to the statements that we hear from Germany, France and Denmark, this investigation is set out to put the responsibility on Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The pipelines have become a flashpoint in the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Germany and Sweden have stepped up maritime patrols in the Baltic to boost security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The four leaks occurred in international waters, but within the exclusive economic zone of Denmark and Sweden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The ongoing crisis as a result of soaring and unstable energy prices is still a huge problem for the European Union. Ahead of winter, the EU is proposing a new set of measures aimed at reducing the cost for citizens and companies. One of them is to reduce price volatility on the main index used to set gas prices, the Title Transfer Facility, or TTF.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The element that we are now putting on the table is the market correction mechanism. So again to take out the speculation and the volatility of the TTF market benchmark that is no more representative and this will have a taming effect on the prices, the gas prices that are traded in the European Union. This mechanism will establish a dynamic price limit for transactions on the TTF benchmark.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the medium term, Brussels also wants to create a benchmark only for liquefied natural gas to complement the one used until now, the TTF, which the Commission says is no longer reflecting the market situation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In addition, and to protect supply and price, the EU wants to make it mandatory for member states to buy at least 15% of their gas for storage through a joint purchase to avoid outbidding each other. At the same time, the Commission also wants to increase energy solidarity among countries in the EU to avoid shortages during this winter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: For now, there are only six solidarity agreements in place but the EU wants this number to rise to around 40 through default solidarity rules within the treaties. And after several months of facing pressure from EU governments the Commission says it's now ready to start a debate for other proposals like the introduction of the so-called Iberian exception which caps the price of gas used to produce electricity, available only for Spain and Portugal, but potentially brought to an EU level.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Something the Commission was reluctant to examine for several months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The proposals and other ideas, like a cap on gas prices, will be discussed by EU leaders at a meeting at the end of the week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Shona Murray, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: week. Shona Murray, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Too little and too late. This is basically how many MEPs here in the European Parliament see the announcement of the European Commission on high energy prices. One of their main arguments is that Europe had eight months to act, because since the start of the war on Ukraine, many people realized that Russia is willing to use energy as a weapon against Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But Brussels was late with the answer, and they waited until the energy prices hit record levels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This is one argument made by Belgian MEP Guy Verhofstadt. I talked to him earlier.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: What I expected was already months ago a global proposal by the Commission to tackle this energy crisis because there are different aspects in it. There is the common purchase, so to have enough energy, that's one thing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: There is the lack of investment in renewables and in the grids, because there are still problems there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And there is then the assistance that is absolutely needed for households and for companies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: So Mr. Verhofstadt, together with dozens of other MEPs, made a new proposal to the head of the European Commission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In a letter they signed, they proposed that the EU should take a common credit, a common loan, to finance the high energy bills of the people and also of the companies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This could be one way to avoid a social crisis this winter in Europe, according to those MEPs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Sándor Zsíros, Euronews, Strasbourg.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The German government's head of cyber security, Arndt Schoenbaum,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: has been sacked for his alleged links to Russian espionage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Interior Ministry is investigating the claims claims but has not given any details.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Cyber security in Germany is very important to me.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: I have reiterated that many times.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A few weeks ago I presented a plan on cyber security and indicated, especially because of the threat of war from Russia and how vulnerable we are, that we must do everything we can to meet this threat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: That's why it has a very special focus and we are studying all necessary, possibly necessary steps.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In my view, there is nothing more to say on the matter." Schoenbaum had faced intense scrutiny, dass er sich in einer russischen Firma verliebt hat, und dass er auf einem populären Late-Night-TV-Show-Serie gebracht wurde.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Vor seinem Regierungsabkommen hat er die Privatassoziation Cyber Security Council Deutschland gegründet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Schoenbaum wird gesagt, dass er damit noch nahe ist.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Einer seiner Mitglieder war eine subsidiäre Firma einer russischen Firma, die gegründet wurde von einem Ex-Mitglied des KGB. Er wird als unverwahrlich verurteilt, während die Investition durchgeführt wird. France Members was a subsidiary company of a Russian firm reportedly founded by an ex-member of the KGB.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He will be presumed innocent while the investigation is carried out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thousands of transport workers, school teachers and medical staff across France took to the streets on Tuesday demanding higher wages to match rising inflation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: After weeks of disruptive walkouts, the CGT union representing refinery workers at Total Energy's oil refineries rejected the company's offer of a 7% pay rise. Leading the protest, Secretary General Philippe Marinès called for a 20% increase to minimum wage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: What we are asking for is an increase in wages, an increase in minimum wage and the sliding scale of wages from the government. And then negotiations in these companies without delay to meet the demand of workers without waiting for a strike.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Although there were no widespread disruptions to public transport, unions have warned more industrial action is coming. The strikes have become President Macron's biggest challenge yet since he was re-elected last May.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Elizabeth Borin told protesters that it's unacceptable that a minority continues to block the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Paris, protesters clashed with riot police resulting in 11 arrests.
